title: Supreme Court and High Court (Extension of Jurisdiction to Federally Administered Tribal Areas) Act, 2018
title_en: Supreme Court and High Court (Extension of Jurisdiction to Federally Administered Tribal Areas) Act, 2018
description: Official consolidated text of Supreme Court and High Court (Extension of Jurisdiction to Federally Administered Tribal Areas) Act, 2018 (X of 2018) published by The Pakistan Code (General Laws).

provisions.title: Section 1. Short title and commencement.⸻ (1) This Act may be called the Supreme Court and
provisions.content:
High Court (Extension of Jurisdiction to Federally Administered Tribal Areas) Act, 2018.
(2)     It shall come into force on such date or dates and in such Federally Administered
Tribal Areas or part thereof, as the Federal Government may, by notification in the official Gazette,
determine from time to time.

provisions.title: Section 2. Extension of jurisdiction of Supreme Court.⸻ The Supreme Court of Pakistan
provisions.content:
shall have, in relation to the Federally Administered Tribal Areas, the same jurisdiction as it has
in relation to the province of the Khyber Pakhtunkhwa.
(3)     Extension of jurisdiction of High Court.⸻ The Peshawar High Court shall have,
in relation to the Federally Administered Tribal Areas, the same jurisdiction as it has in relation to
the province of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa.
